00025 #include "OgrePointEmitter.h"
00026 #include "OgreParticle.h"
00027 
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     PointEmitter::PointEmitter()
00034     {
00035         mType = "Point";
00036         // Set up parameters
00037         if (createParamDictionary("PointEmitter"))
00038         {
00039             addBaseParameters();
00040         }
00041         // No custom parameters
00042     }
00043     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044     void PointEmitter::_initParticle(Particle* pParticle)
00045     {
00046         // Very simple emitter, uses default implementations with no modification
00047 
00048         // Point emitter emits from own position
00049         pParticle->mPosition = mPosition;
00050 
00051         // Generate complex data by reference
00052         genEmissionColour(pParticle->mColour);
00053         genEmissionDirection(pParticle->mDirection);
00054         genEmissionVelocity(pParticle->mDirection);
00055 
00056         // Generate simpler data
00057         pParticle->mTimeToLive = genEmissionTTL();
00058         
00059     }
00060     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00061     unsigned short PointEmitter::_getEmissionCount(Real timeElapsed)
00062     {
00063         // Use basic constant emission 
00064         return genConstantEmissionCount(timeElapsed);
00065     }
00066 }
